docs.snippet: JAMEL THOMAS, 17, of Freeport, had 30 minutes to figure out how to attract more customers to a make-believe men's clothing store. The role-playing scenario was one part of a regional contest, held on Jan. 12 and sponsored by DECA, the national pro...
docs.lead_paragraph: JAMEL THOMAS, 17, of Freeport, had 30 minutes to figure out how to attract more customers to a make-believe men's clothing store. The role-playing scenario was one part of a regional contest, held on Jan. 12 and sponsored by DECA, the national program that teaches marketing and business skills to high school students. In the annual competition, 800 or so students from schools in Nassau County participated in the regional battle at the Nassau Coliseum, where they showed off what they had learned in business classes and any relevant real-life experience.
docs.abstract: About 800 students from Nassau County schools participate in annual contest sponsored by DECA, national program that teaches marketing and business skills to high school students, at Nassau Coliseum; judges include George Ross, senior legal counsel and executive vice president of Trump Organization who can be seen on television show The Apprentice; students comment on what they hope to gain by experience; photo (M)

headline.main: Teenagers Get a Taste of 'The Apprentice'

docs.snippet: Most people think of Trump as a wheeler-dealer -- some even consider him brash. I know the real Trump, the man who loves this city and country. He respects intelligence and cares about people who are committed to him. Above all, he is a man who ha...
docs.lead_paragraph: Most people think of Trump as a wheeler-dealer -- some even consider him brash. I know the real Trump, the man who loves this city and country. He respects intelligence and cares about people who are committed to him. Above all, he is a man who has a love affair with New York. The great buildings he creates, his many Taj Mahals (if not his writings) will endure as evidence of his success for generations. NORMA I. FOERDERER New York

docs.snippet: Donald J. Trump appointed Terry Hallcom as president of the Trump Shuttle yesterday. Mr. Hallcom has been director of flight operations and before that was a pilot for Eastern Airlines for 22 years.   He replaces Richard F. Cozzi, who will leave O...
docs.lead_paragraph: Donald J. Trump appointed Terry Hallcom as president of the Trump Shuttle yesterday. Mr. Hallcom has been director of flight operations and before that was a pilot for Eastern Airlines for 22 years. He replaces Richard F. Cozzi, who will leave Oct. 1 to become a vice president at the DHL Corporation, an air cargo company.

headline.main: Shuttle Head Is Appointed By Trump

headline.main: For Trump, Seeds of a Comeback

docs.snippet: Anthony B. Gliedman, the former City Housing Commissioner, had been in his new job less than three weeks when his new employer, Donald J. Trump, called him into his office on the morning of May 22.   Mr. Trump had just read in the newspaper that t...
docs.lead_paragraph: Anthony B. Gliedman, the former City Housing Commissioner, had been in his new job less than three weeks when his new employer, Donald J. Trump, called him into his office on the morning of May 22. Mr. Trump had just read in the newspaper that the Koch administration had decided to start all over in its six-year effort to rebuild the Wollman Memorial Rink in Central Park. The city was proposing to hire an engineering company to draw up plans for a new rink, and if all went well, New Yorkers might be ice skating again in 18 months. ''Donald said he felt that we could do this in four months,'' Mr. Gliedman recalled last week. Thus began one of the bolder feats of civic bravado tried in New York in recent years.

headline.main: NEW YORK HOPES TO LEARN FROM RINK TRUMP FIXED
